seeds.name: Minced Radish Salad
seeds.ingrediants: Radish, Cilantro, Red Onion, Lime, Salt, Bowl
seeds.instructions: 1. Remove the green stem and wash radish, 2. Mince the radish and red onion, 3. Chop the cilantro, 4. Mix everything together in  a bowl, 5. Add salt and lime as much as you prefer

seeds.name: Chicken with Scallions
seeds.ingrediants: 8 Pieces of Chicken, 2 Bunches of Green Onions, Salt 0r Goya Chicken Seasoning, Garlic, Black Pepper, Thyme, Bay Leaves, Oil, White Vinegar, a Pot
seeds.instructions: 1. Wash the chicken and place in a pot, 2. Add 1/4 cup of Vinegar and 1/3 cup of Vinegar, 3. Add 2 Bay leaves, 4. Add 1/3 Teaspoon of Thyme, 5. Add 2 cloves of garlic, 6.  Chop up green onions and add to pot, 7. Add salt or seasoing to your liking, 8. Add 1/2 cup of water, 9. Cover the pot and cook for 1 hour at low heat

seeds.name: Eggs with Ham
seeds.ingrediants: Eggs, Ham, Tomatoe, Onion, Garlic, Oil
seeds.instructions: 1. Put oil in a pan, 2. Fry for 2 minutes chopped up onion, tomatoe, and garlic, 3. Add beat eggs and chopped up ham, 4. Cook until eggs are ready
